text: Erskine Station is an unincorporated community in Center Township, Vanderburgh County, in the U.S. state of Indiana. It is located outside the city limits of Evansville to the north. ==Geography== Erskine Station is located at . ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Vanderburgh County, Indiana Category:Unincorporated communities in Indiana
title: Erskine Station, Indiana
